ThingDef.Label: bed
ThingDef.Description: A cozy mattress and sheets on a frame for resting.

ThingDef.Label: bed (red)
ThingDef.Description: A cozy mattress and red sheets on a frame for resting.

ThingDef.Label: bed (yellow)
ThingDef.Description: A cozy mattress and yellow sheets on a frame for resting.

ThingDef.Label: bed (green)
ThingDef.Description: A cozy mattress and green sheets on a frame for resting.

ThingDef.Label: bed (blue)
ThingDef.Description: A cozy mattress and blue sheets on a frame for resting.

ThingDef.Label: bed (purple)
ThingDef.Description: A cozy mattress and purple sheets on a frame for resting.

ThingDef.Label: double bed
ThingDef.Description: A simple double-wide bed that fits two people.

ThingDef.Label: double bed (red)
ThingDef.Description: A simple double-wide bed that fits two people. Red sheets.

ThingDef.Label: double bed (yellow)
ThingDef.Description: A simple double-wide bed that fits two people. Yellow sheets.

ThingDef.Label: double bed (green)
ThingDef.Description: A simple double-wide bed that fits two people. Green sheets.

ThingDef.Label: double bed (blue)
ThingDef.Description: A simple double-wide bed that fits two people. Blue sheets.

ThingDef.Label: double bed (purple)
ThingDef.Description: A simple double-wide bed that fits two people. Purple sheets.

ThingDef.label: royal bed
ThingDef.Description: A luxurious gold-inlaid bed fit for the highborn. Very comfy and beautiful. Fits two.

ThingDef.label: royal bed (red)
ThingDef.Description: A luxurious bed fit for the highborn, topped with crisp red sheets.

ThingDef.label: royal bed (yellow)
ThingDef.Description: A luxurious bed fit for the highborn, topped with crisp yellow sheets.

ThingDef.label: royal bed (green)
ThingDef.Description: A luxurious bed fit for the highborn, topped with crisp green sheets.

ThingDef.label: royal bed (blue)
ThingDef.Description: A luxurious bed fit for the highborn, topped with crisp blue sheets.

ThingDef.label: royal bed (purple)
ThingDef.Description: A luxurious bed fit for the highborn, topped with crisp purple sheets.

ThingDef.label: hospital bed
ThingDef.Description: A bed specially designed for injured people. Improves chance of successful medical work.

ThingDef.label: guest bed
ThingDef.Description: A place for guests to sleep during their stay.

ThingDef.label: Animal Feed Trough
ThingDef.description: Designated storage area for animal feed.

ThingDef.label: barn stall
ThingDef.description: A stall for your barn animals. Fits any animal.

ThingDef.label: square dining chair
ThingDef.description: A comfortable and attractive chair for sitting at a table.

ThingDef.label: cushioned chair
ThingDef.description: A large, soft, comfy seat. Great for relaxation and dining.

ThingDef.label: couch right
ThingDef.description: A piece of a large, soft, comfy sofa. Great for relaxation.

ThingDef.label: couch center
ThingDef.description: A piece of a large, soft, comfy sofa. Great for relaxation.

ThingDef.label: couch left
ThingDef.description: A piece of a large, soft, comfy sofa. Great for relaxation.

ThingDef.label: couch corner
ThingDef.description: A piece of a large, soft, comfy sofa. Great for relaxation.

ThingDef.label: couch corner Inverted
ThingDef.description: A piece of a large, soft, comfy sofa. Great for relaxation.

ThingDef.label: linkable stool
ThingDef.description: People sit here.

ThingDef.label: Counter
ThingDef.description: An Counter, has a large flat top.

ThingDef.label: angled planter
ThingDef.description: Plant decorative flowers here to improve the mood of people nearby.

ThingDef.label: modular planter
ThingDef.description: A large flat pot for decorative flowers.

ThingDef.label: dresser
ThingDef.description: A place for colonist to store personal belongings. When placed with a bed it will increase comfort and rest effectiveness slightly.

ThingDef.label: end table
ThingDef.description: This small table goes well with a bed. When placed with a bed it will increase comfort and rest effectiveness slightly.

ThingDef.label: end table light
ThingDef.description: This small table goes well with a bed. When placed with a bed it will increase comfort and rest effectiveness slightly. Includes a lamp.

ThingDef.label: file cabinet
ThingDef.description: A important place to store important documents about important experiments used for important research on important technologies. Increases research speed slightly when next to a research bench.

ThingDef.label: book rack
ThingDef.description: A small bookshelf with a few books. Can be upgraded to a bookshelf. Boosts writing speed by 5% when placed near a writing table. Only one book rack can be linked to a single writing table.

ThingDef.label: bookshelf
ThingDef.description: A bookshelf with a variety of books. Can be upgraded to a bookcase. Boosts writing speed by 10% when placed near a writing table. Only two bookshelves can be linked to a single writing table.

ThingDef.label: bookcase
ThingDef.description: A bookcase with a wide variety of books. Boosts writing speed by 20% when placed near a writing table. Up to four bookcases can be linked to a single writing table.

ThingDef.label: reading table
ThingDef.description: A small table made to be the perfect height for reading. Colonists can read at it when placed near a book rack, bookshelf, or bookcase.

ThingDef.label: card table
ThingDef.description: A table specially made for playing a wide variety of card games. Suitable for 1-4 players

ThingDef.label: thurible
ThingDef.description: A thurible designed for burning special AEA Tanks. Releases a mood-altering vapor into the air which affects all nearby colonists.

ThingDef.label: dartboard
ThingDef.description: A game about accuracy often played at pubs and bars. Players throw darts from a distance and attempt to get them to hit certain areas on the board. It's relaxing, and even trains hand-eye coordination.

ThingDef.Label: Glassworks TV
ThingDef.Description: A higher-tech glass television with crystal-clear image and richer color. More entertaining than a grainy tube TV.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (red)
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in red.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (green)
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in green.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (blue)
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in blue.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (magenta)
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in magenta.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (yellow)
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in yellow.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (orange)
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in orange.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (purple)
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in purple.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (aqua)
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in aqua.

ThingDef.label: standing lamp (lime)
ThingDef.description: Standing lamp that lights an area in lime.

ThingDef.label: alert lamp
ThingDef.description: A smart lamp whose color will change to indicate the colony's current threat level. Requires a powered threat sensor in order to function correctly. Lamps glow faint green when nothing dangerous is nearby, yellow if your colonists are not outnumbered, and red if they are.

ThingDef.label: outdoor lamp
ThingDef.description: A weather proof lamp only placeable outdoors.

ThingDef.label: outdoor light
ThingDef.description: A light source which is weather proof.

ThingDef.label: torch lamp
ThingDef.description: A wooden torch for lighting an area. Can be automatically refueled with coal, bamboo, or wood. Produces a small amount of heat.

ThingDef.label: wall torch
ThingDef.Description: A wall mounted torch for lighting an area. Can be automatically refueled with coal, bamboo, or wood. Not a good source of heat. Must be placed on a wall.

ThingDef.label: ceiling lamp
ThingDef.description: Ceiling lamp that lights an area.

ThingDef.label: ceiling lamp (red)
ThingDef.description: Ceiling lamp that lights an area in a dull red color.

ThingDef.label: ceiling lamp (blue)
ThingDef.description: Ceiling lamp that lights an area in a dull blue color. Also has a calming affect.

ThingDef.label: ceiling lamp (green)
ThingDef.description: Ceiling lamp that lights an area in a dull green color.

ThingDef.label: ceiling lamp (violet)
ThingDef.description: Ceiling lamp that lights an area in a violet color.

ThingDef.label: ceiling lamp (yellow)
ThingDef.description: Ceiling lamp that lights an area in a dull yellow color.

ThingDef.label: ceiling lamp (orange)
ThingDef.description: Ceiling lamp that lights an area in a dull Orange color.

ThingDef.label: wall lamp
ThingDef.description: A lamp only placeable on a wall. Produces more light than average.

ThingDef.label: sun lamp
ThingDef.description: Lights an area brightly enough to grow crops.

ThingDef.label: small sun lamp
ThingDef.description: Lights an area brightly enough to grow crops.

ThingDef.label: mini sun lamp
ThingDef.description: Lights an area brightly enough to grow crops.

ThingDef.label: heated sun lamp
ThingDef.description: Lights an area brightly enough to grow crops. Also is a small heater that will keep your room warm.

ThingDef.label: small heated sun lamp
ThingDef.description: Lights an area brightly enough to grow crops.

ThingDef.label: mini heated sun lamp
ThingDef.description: Lights an area brightly enough to grow crops.
